fields.name: ActiveRevisionsMode
fields.description:
ActiveRevisionsMode controls how active revisions are handled for the Container app:
<list><item>Multiple: multiple revisions can be active.</item><item>Single: Only one revision can be active at a time. Revision weights can not be used in this mode. If no value if provided, this is the default.</item></list>

fields.name: Dapr
fields.description: Dapr configuration for the Container App.

fields.name: Registries
fields.description: Collection of private container registry credentials for containers used by the Container app

fields.name: Secrets
fields.description: Collection of secrets used by a Container app
